column6: The gateway does not know how to connect to the specified service. Make sure the URL is correct. If so the service might be shutdown due to maintenance or an error.
The page or resource does not seem to exist on this service.
The gateway was faced with something unexpected.
The gateway received something invalid from the service it was trying to reach.

column5: ゲートウェイタイムアウト
column6: The gateway waited for too long on a service.

column5: セービスを移行しています
column6: We are migrating potate.space to a new server, this shouldn't take too long. 1 or 2 hours tops, we hope.

column5: セービスを保守しています
column6: A maintenance operation is in progress. We are trying to keep it as short as possible. Some backup, update or housekeeping tasks require us to have downtime. This shouldn't last more than 15 minutes.
